text: Pre-jury morning thought: in thinking about the work that this study has required, I'd love for us to be able to capture the effort for both video and writing, as well as pros and cons of how we've tackled this one. However we go about that, I'd love for us to learn from this experience so we can keep these up.
Agreed! Note <@U02F9CXTL> let's connect on logo animation, that's something Trent & I have been working on for some time
<@U0J6TE0CA> quick stand up once youre in

Good stand up.  We’re tracing the following tasks oil ‘Done’ with the Video:

- Port over to Premier (In Progress) 
- Refine cuts to match music
- Swap out insert shots (Jason working in parallel to support Emily)
—
Save out a cut as this is ‘final’ cut.  Review with Ewald and Justin.  Hopefully today.  
—
(in order of priority)
- color correct
- erase windows on dolly shot
- de-warp
- stabilize
- final card logo treatment

All this, complete by Tuesday of next week for sharing back with Google!
